detectors.description:
BurnMachine.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#792-811) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(rewardsDuration) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#794)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#797)
detectors.markdown:
[BurnMachine.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#L792-L811) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(rewardsDuration)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#L794)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#L797)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in BurnMachine.getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#779-786):
	External calls:
	- rewardsToken.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#783)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RewardPaid(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#784)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [BurnMachine.getReward()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#L779-L786):
	External calls:
	- [rewardsToken.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#L783)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [RewardPaid(msg.sender,reward)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#L784)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in BurnMachine.recoverERC20(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#814-822):

	- IERC20(tokenAddress).safeTransfer(owner(),tokenAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#820)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Recovered(tokenAddress,tokenAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#821)

detectors.description:
BurnMachine.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#792-811) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= periodFinish (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#793)
	- require(bool,string)(rewardRate <= balance.div(rewardsDuration),Provided reward too high) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#806)
detectors.markdown:
[BurnMachine.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#L792-L811) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [block.timestamp >= periodFinish](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#L793)
	- [require(bool,string)(rewardRate <= balance.div(rewardsDuration),Provided reward too high)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#L806)

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.7.1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#5) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11

detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#405-411):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#409)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#471-492):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#475)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#79-82)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#88-92)

paused() should be declared external:
	- Pausable.paused() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#597-599)

getBlockNumber() should be declared external:
	- BurnMachine.getBlockNumber() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnMachine.sol#749-751)

getReward() should be declared external:
